Developer Case Studies
Login
*we will not disseminate your email and so you avoid spam
Fasten Connect provides a unified API for accessing medical records from multiple institutions. Our platform lets developers build applications with access to patient health data in minutes.

A Unified Medical

Record API

With connections to the largest health systems & payers, like:

Seamless User Experience

Fasten Connect makes it easy for users to share their medical records securely and quickly, letting you focus on building your application.

Instant account connection

Native FHIR Exports

Patient empowered data sharing

HIPAA compliant

Built for Developers

Fasten Connect gives developers the tools they need to create easy and accessible user experiences. With just a few lines of code, your patients can share records from more than 27,000 healthcare institutions.

Robust documentation

Javascript SDK

API-First Design

World-class support

Getting Started with Fasten Connect

01
Sign Up for Fasten Connect
Register on our Developer mode to get started.
02
Get API Keys
Access your credentials and connect to our endpoint directory.
03
Integrate Securely
Embed our iframe or code for fast, HIPAA-compliant data-sharing.
Why Fasten Connect?
Quick Connections
Instantly link to healthcare systems for fast, secure access
FHIR-Compatible Exports
Easily integrate standardized health data.
Patient-Controlled Sharing
Patients securely share their records.
Top-Tier Compliance
Fully HIPAA and HITRUST-certified for data security.
Developer-Friendly Tools
Includes clear documentation, JavaScript SDK, and API-first design.
Real-Time Updates
Access accurate, up-to-date patient data anytime.
